mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_wechat_public (id, name, app_id, secret, domain_name, `status`) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{appId}, #{secret}, #{domainName}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_wechat_public SET name = #{name}, app_id = #{appId}, secret = #{secret}, domain_name = #{domainName}, `status` = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT id, name, app_id AS appId, secret, domain_name AS domainName, `status` FROM tb_wechat_public WHERE 1=1
AND name like '%${name}%'
SELECT id, name, app_id AS appId, secret, domain_name AS domainName, access_token AS accessToken, access_token_expire_time AS accessTokenExpireTime, `status` FROM tb_wechat_public WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, name, app_id AS appId, secret, domain_name AS domainName, access_token AS accessToken, access_token_expire_time AS accessTokenExpireTime, `status` FROM tb_wechat_public WHERE app_id = #{id}
